name: Coffee Runner (EMSPHYR)
description: This my first game in unity, so don't expect too much. I already know there are problems with it, but I'm just here to have fun making games with little to no suffering... Last thing, don't expect the hard mode to work lul. I think I know a way to actually be good at it, but I'm moving on to bigger and better things heh heh heh.. oh and uhhh thanks for playing!
